title: Gold V Season 4 + 9-1 in Provisional = Silver V Season 5?
body:
I had high hopes of coming back to this game, thought I would play my provisional for the year.
Won 9/10 of them with absolute ease, then I get promoted to Silver V?

This system is absolutely absurd, seriously riot - you don't know how to match a players skill at all.
It shouldn't be possible to drop 5 ranks and a tier, after dominating placements.

replies.body:
I understand my MMR was lower than my rank of Gold V, because I dropped to 1400 MMR after getting Gold V (high silver).

However I don't understand how going from 1400 @ January, not playing for 3 months, going 9-1 in Provisionals - Drops me from 1380 to 1150? If anything I should remain exactly where I was.

This system is fkd.
Hint: you probably had low silver MMR (as in just inside silver V) but was still in gold, given that and the somewhat harder reset this year, means that 9/10 can easily land you in silver V
Agreed the system is fucked.. I was B3 won 9/10 and ended up in B4..
Your MMR is reset pretty much, GoldV is still technically silver anyway.
There are people with 1/10 wins yet they are in Silver 1, life is unfair
I went 7/3 and got silver 2. if you deserve to rise, you will. simple as that.
